mapper.insert: insert into notice (notice_id, type_id, title, content, image1_file_id, image2_file_id, image3_file_id, doc_file_id, writer, view_cnt, target_type_id, is_exposed, created_at, updated_at) values (0, #{typeId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{image1FileId},#{image2FileId}, #{image3FileId},#{docFileId}, #{writer}, 0, #{targetTypeId}, 1, now(), null)
mapper.select: select n.*, c.name, f1.file_name AS image1FileName, f1.file_rename AS image1FileRename, f1.storage_path AS image1StoragePath, f2.file_name AS image2FileName, f2.file_rename AS image2FileRename, f2.storage_path AS image2StoragePath, f3.file_name AS image3FileName, f3.file_rename AS image3FileRename, f3.storage_path AS image3StoragePath from notice n join code_detail c on (n.type_id = c.code_detail_id) LEFT JOIN upload_file f1 ON (n.image1_file_id = f1.upload_file_id) LEFT JOIN upload_file f2 ON (n.image2_file_id = f2.upload_file_id) LEFT JOIN upload_file f3 ON (n.image3_file_id = f3.upload_file_id) where n.notice_id = #{num}

select count(*) from notice where target_type_id = 5
and (created_at >= #{startDateTime} and created_at < #{endDateTime})
and type_id = 28
and type_id = 29
and type_id = 30
and title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
select n.*, c.name from notice n join code_detail c on (n.type_id = c.code_detail_id) where target_type_id = 5 order by notice_id desc limit #{start_p},#{post_ea}

select n.*, c.name from notice n join code_detail c on (n.type_id = c.code_detail_id) where n.target_type_id = 5
and (n.created_at >= #{startDateTime} and n.created_at < #{endDateTime})
and n.type_id = 28
and n.type_id = 29
and n.type_id = 30
and n.title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and n.content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
order by n.notice_id desc limit #{start_p},#{post_ea}
mapper.update: update notice set view_cnt = view_cnt+1 where notice_id=#{num}
